tool_description: Validates document margins, indentation, and spacing compliance with academic formatting requirements.

document_path.description: Path to the document file to validate

margin_requirements.description: Margin requirements in inches [top, bottom, left, right]

error_messages: File not found: The specified document path does not exist.
Invalid margin values: Margins must be between 0.25 and 3.0 inches.
Invalid indent value: Paragraph indent must be between 0.0 and 2.0 inches.
Unsupported file format: Only Word documents and PDFs are supported.
Cannot extract layout information: Document format prevents margin analysis.
usage: Provide document_path and optionally specify margin_requirements and paragraph_indent to validate document spacing and layout.

current_margins.description: Current margin measurements [top, bottom, left, right]

spacing_issues.description: List of margin and spacing problems
